name: Coggle
description:
Coggle!

 He's got a heart of gold and occasionally a cog of gold. Today he's been tasked with getting rid of an invasive species - cats. However, he'll need the help of... cats... to defeat the evil and nefarious... cats...

 Get yourself beaten up to ascend a cat tower made for the gods, or fall to your untimely trying-again. Either way is fine with Coggle, because he doesn't know how to be not ok with things in a general sense.
